successes.title: Affordable 20"x12" LASER Cutter / Engraver, Assembled in USA
successes.description: This laser has the potential to be a game changer, making production level home manufacturing and engraving possible.

Pledges.description: Our sincere thanks for supporting this crucial maker tool!  Plus, have your e-mail address added to our newsletter including our specials and informative write-ups if you wish.  Also get to vote on what our new alternative color scheme should be!
Newsletter, thanks, vote, plus we will add your name to our website "Thank You Kickstarter" page.
Everything in #2, plus receive a limited edition test pattern engraving done on our new LASER and signed on the back by the engineer that cut it. (postage included)
Group fund lasers for charity.  We will allocate all pledges in this category to donate a laser every $3500 to a school, charity, hackerspace or other non-profit.

Anyone that makes a pledge can suggest their favorite cause and vote on a cause for donation.
In case of vote ties, we will use a random drawing 
to award the laser.  We will have full transparency in this transaction.

Get a spare high quality laser tube for your new LASER. (Note: Shipping not included. Please add correct shipping to your pledge total for your reward to be processed correctly: add $25 in lower 48 US, $100 elsewhere. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing.)

Get the new rotary attachment sub-floor for your new LASER. (please add correct shipping to pledge for your reward to be processed correctly: add $65 in lower 48 US, $90 elsewhere. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing.)

Get a radiator style water chiller for you New Laser. (Note: shipping not included. Please add correct shipping to your pledge total for your reward to be processed correctly: add $45 in lower 48 US, $75 elsewhere. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing.)

We'll send you an advanced Freon Water Chiller for your new LASER. (Please add correct shipping to pledge for your reward to be processed correctly: add $75 in lower 48 US, $125 elsewhere. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing.)

ULTRA early bird special (Limited, Only 10 at this price.) Become the first to own your very own working laser at the best price possible (will retail for $3,500. Save $500 and get yours first.). Fully assembled in US. Will be available shortly after KS ends. (Note: Shipping not included. Please add $125 for shipping to US lower 48, $275 shipping to Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, $550 shipping to Europe or Asia or $750 shipping anywhere else. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing. Or come to Vegas for pick up!)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! Limited to backers 11-50! Become an owner of your very own complete laser (will retail for $3,500 so save $300). Fully assembled here in Las Vegas and available shortly after Ultra-Early Birders are taken care of. (Note: Shipping not included. Please add $125 for shipping to US lower 48, $275 shipping to Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, $550 shipping to Europe or Asia or $750 shipping anywhere else. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing. Or come to Vegas for pick up when its ready.)

Kickstarter special: Own your own laser and save $100 off retail! Fully assembled here in Las Vegas will be ready shortly after the Early Birders are taken care of. (NOTE: Shipping not included. Add $125 for shipping to US lower 48, $275 shipping to Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, $550 shipping to Europe or Asia or $750 shipping anywhere else. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing. Or come to Vegas for in-store pick up when it's ready.)

Get the new Laser + the forthcoming rotary attachment. (NOTE: Shipping not included. Add $190 for shipping to US lower 48, $395 shipping to Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, $670 shipping to Europe or Asia or $870 shipping anywhere else. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing. Or come to Vegas for in-store pick up when it's ready. Rotary to ship about 1 month after laser.)

Customize your color scheme! You will receive a new laser with your colors of choice. Please apply standard shipping, and allow +1 month for processing. (Note: Shipping not included. Please add $125 for shipping to US lower 48, $275 shipping to Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, $550 shipping to Europe or Asia or $750 shipping anywhere else. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing. Or come to Vegas for pick up when it's ready.)

New Laser, Luxury package. Get a new laser + Rotary Attachment and Radiator style water chiller. (Note: Shipping not included. Add $190 for shipping to US lower 48, $395 shipping to Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, $670 shipping to Europe or Asia or $870 shipping anywhere else. Or sign up for UPS or Fedex account and simply supply your account number for direct billing. Rotary to ship about 1 month after laser.)

ULTRA-Early bird 2 pack. Get two lasers for side by side processing or to give one to a friend! Lowest price available! Extremely limited quantities at this price-point. (Note: Shipping not included: Please add same shipping rates as single laser times 2).
